titleStmt.title: Retailing brokers Commune concilium tentum in camera Guihalde Ciuitatis Londini, nono die Aprilis, anno regni dominæ nostræ Elizabethæ, Dei gratia Angliæ, Franciæ, & Hiberniæ Reginæ, fidei defensoris &c. Tricesimo septimo. Coram Iohanne Spencer, Maiore Ciuitatis Londini, & Aldermannis eiusdem Ciuitatis, ac maiore parte Communiariorum Ciuitatis pr[æ]dictæ de Communi Concilio eiusdem Ciuitatis existentium.
Acts & Orders. 1595-04-09
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [J. Windet for] Iohn VVolfe, printer to the honourable Cittie of London,

notesStmt.note: Imprint from colophon; printer's name from STC.
An act for reforming abuses by retailing brokers.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
